trans-unit.source: Enable monitoring and diagnostics
trans-unit.target: Enable monitoring and diagnostics

trans-unit.source: Learn how to set up diagnostics for your resources in Azure.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to set up diagnostics for your resources in Azure.

trans-unit.source: Enable monitoring and diagnostics
trans-unit.target: Enable monitoring and diagnostics

trans-unit.source: In the <link><linkText>Azure Portal</linkText><title></title></link>, you can configure rich, frequent, monitoring and diagnostics data about your resources.
trans-unit.target: In the <link><linkText>Azure Portal</linkText><title></title></link>, you can configure rich, frequent, monitoring and diagnostics data about your resources.

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <link><linkText>REST API</linkText><title></title></link> or <link><linkText>.NET SDK</linkText><title></title></link> to configure diagnostics programmatically.
trans-unit.target: You can also use the <link><linkText>REST API</linkText><title></title></link> or <link><linkText>.NET SDK</linkText><title></title></link> to configure diagnostics programmatically.

trans-unit.source: Diagnostics, monitoring and metric data in Azure is saved into a Storage account of your choice.
trans-unit.target: Diagnostics, monitoring and metric data in Azure is saved into a Storage account of your choice.

trans-unit.source: This allows you to use whatever tooling you want to read the data, from a storage explorer, to Power BI to third-party tooling.
trans-unit.target: This allows you to use whatever tooling you want to read the data, from a storage explorer, to Power BI to third-party tooling.

trans-unit.source: When you create a resource
trans-unit.target: When you create a resource

trans-unit.source: Most services allow you to enable diagnostics when you first create them in the <link><linkText>Azure Portal</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: Most services allow you to enable diagnostics when you first create them in the <link><linkText>Azure Portal</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: Go to New and choose the resource you are interested in.
trans-unit.target: Go to New and choose the resource you are interested in.

trans-unit.source: Select Optional configuration.
trans-unit.target: Select Optional configuration.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Diagnostics blade</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Diagnostics blade</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Select Diagnostics, and click On.
trans-unit.target: Select Diagnostics, and click On.

trans-unit.source: You will need to choose the Storage account that you want diagnostics to be saved to.
trans-unit.target: You will need to choose the Storage account that you want diagnostics to be saved to.

trans-unit.source: You’ll be charged normal data rates for storage and transactions when you send diagnostics to a storage account.
trans-unit.target: You’ll be charged normal data rates for storage and transactions when you send diagnostics to a storage account.

trans-unit.source: Click OK and create the resource.
trans-unit.target: Click OK and create the resource.

trans-unit.source: Change settings for an existing resource
trans-unit.target: Change settings for an existing resource

trans-unit.source: If you have already created a resource and you want to change the diagnostics settings (to change the level of data collection, for example), you can do that right in the Azure Portal.
trans-unit.target: If you have already created a resource and you want to change the diagnostics settings (to change the level of data collection, for example), you can do that right in the Azure Portal.

trans-unit.source: Go to the resource and click the Settings command.
trans-unit.target: Go to the resource and click the Settings command.

trans-unit.source: Select Diagnostics.
trans-unit.target: Select Diagnostics.

trans-unit.source: The Diagnostics blade has all of the possible diagnostics and monitoring collection data for that resource.
trans-unit.target: The Diagnostics blade has all of the possible diagnostics and monitoring collection data for that resource.

trans-unit.source: For some resources you can also choose a Retention policy for the data, to clean it up from your storage account.
trans-unit.target: For some resources you can also choose a Retention policy for the data, to clean it up from your storage account.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Storage diagnostics</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Storage diagnostics</linkText>

trans-unit.source: Once you've chosen your settings, click the Save command.
trans-unit.target: Once you've chosen your settings, click the Save command.

trans-unit.source: It may take a little while for monitoring data to show up if you are enabling it for the first time.
trans-unit.target: It may take a little while for monitoring data to show up if you are enabling it for the first time.

trans-unit.source: Categories of data collection for virtual machines
trans-unit.target: Categories of data collection for virtual machines

trans-unit.source: For virtual machines all metrics and logs will be recorded at one-minute intervals, so you can always have the most up-to-date information about your machine.
trans-unit.target: For virtual machines all metrics and logs will be recorded at one-minute intervals, so you can always have the most up-to-date information about your machine.

trans-unit.source: Basic metrics : Health metrics about your virtual machine such as processor and memory
trans-unit.target: Basic metrics : Health metrics about your virtual machine such as processor and memory

trans-unit.source: Network and web metrics : Metrics about your network connections and web services
trans-unit.target: Network and web metrics : Metrics about your network connections and web services

trans-unit.source: .NET metrics : Metrics about the .NET and ASP.NET applications running on your virtual machine
trans-unit.target: .NET metrics : Metrics about the .NET and ASP.NET applications running on your virtual machine

trans-unit.source: SQL metrics : If you are running Microsoft SQL Service, its performance metrics
trans-unit.target: SQL metrics : If you are running Microsoft SQL Service, its performance metrics

trans-unit.source: Windows event application logs : Windows events that are sent to the application channel
trans-unit.target: Windows event application logs : Windows events that are sent to the application channel

trans-unit.source: Windows event system logs : Windows events that are sent to the system channel. This also includes all events from Microsoft Antimalware.
trans-unit.target: Windows event system logs : Windows events that are sent to the system channel. This also includes all events from Microsoft Antimalware.

trans-unit.source: Windows event security logs : Windows events that are sent to the security channel
trans-unit.target: Windows event security logs : Windows events that are sent to the security channel

trans-unit.source: Diagnostics infrastructure logs : Logging about the diagnostics collection infrastructure
trans-unit.target: Diagnostics infrastructure logs : Logging about the diagnostics collection infrastructure

trans-unit.source: IIS logs : Logs about your IIS server
trans-unit.target: IIS logs : Logs about your IIS server

trans-unit.source: Note that at this time certain distributions of Linux are not supported, and, the Guest Agent must be installed on the virtual machine.
trans-unit.target: Note that at this time certain distributions of Linux are not supported, and, the Guest Agent must be installed on the virtual machine.

trans-unit.source: Next steps
trans-unit.target: Next steps

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Receive alert notifications</linkText><title></title></link> whenever operational events happen or metrics cross a threshold.
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Receive alert notifications</linkText><title></title></link> whenever operational events happen or metrics cross a threshold.

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Monitor service metrics</linkText><title></title></link> to make sure your service is available and responsive.
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Monitor service metrics</linkText><title></title></link> to make sure your service is available and responsive.

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Scale instance count automatically</linkText><title></title></link> to make sure your service scale based on demand.
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Scale instance count automatically</linkText><title></title></link> to make sure your service scale based on demand.

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Monitor application performance</linkText><title></title></link> if you want to understand exactly how your code is performing in the cloud.
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Monitor application performance</linkText><title></title></link> if you want to understand exactly how your code is performing in the cloud.

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>View events and audit logs</linkText><title></title></link> to learn everything that has happened in your service.
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>View events and audit logs</linkText><title></title></link> to learn everything that has happened in your service.

trans-unit.source: <link><linkText>Track service health</linkText><title></title></link> to find out when Azure has experienced performance degradation or service interruptions.
trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Track service health</linkText><title></title></link> to find out when Azure has experienced performance degradation or service interruptions.
